title: [Black Moor, Scorched Heath]
description: The mist collects in a series of gravelike furrows in the ground, swirling and writhing like some almost-living thing.  Blackened, broken stones and scrawny patches of heather and brush lie scattered around the bleak moor, and the ghostly howl of the wind echoes through the miasmal air.

The mist collects in a series of gravelike furrows in the ground, swirling and writhing like some almost-living thing.  Blackened, broken stones and scrawny patches of heather and brush lie scattered around the bleak moor, and the ghostly howl of the wind echoes through the miasmal night.
